long_description: Cycling friendly as well as destination friendly, the women's Novara Ballard Bike Shirt takes you via bike from home to the farmer's market to the coffee shop with aplomb. Polyester/cotton/rayon blend is soft and stretchy, and wicks moisture to keep you comfortable in warm weather. Droptail hem adds coverage while on the bike. 2 back zippered pockets stow your cash and ID; one pocket has a media port. Reflective trim enhances visibility in low light. Novara Ballard Bike Shirt features an easy fit that's not too tight or too loose.
